fields.title: Greetings: Hello, Hi, Goodbye
fields.content:
Hello!
My name is Amina.
Hi! My name is Arman.
Nice to meet you, Arman!
Nice to meet you too, Amina.
Goodbye!
Bye!
fields.vocabulary:
Hello – Сәлеметсіз бе, Сәлем
Hi – Сәлем
Goodbye – Сау болыңыз
Bye – Сау бол
My name is... – Менің атым...
Nice to meet you – Танысқаныма қуаныштымын
Too – да, де
fields.grammar:
Қарапайым амандасу және қоштасу сөздері ағылшын тілінде:

Hello және Hi — амандасу үшін қолданылады.

Goodbye және Bye — қоштасу үшін қолданылады.

Танысқанда қолданатын тіркес:

My name is ... (Менің атым ...)

Nice to meet you. (Танысқаныма қуаныштымын.)
fields.dialogue:
Amina: Hello!
Arman: Hi!
Amina: My name is Amina. What's your name?
Arman: My name is Arman. Nice to meet you.
Amina: Nice to meet you too. Goodbye!
Arman: Bye!

fields.title: How are you?
fields.content:
Arman: Hi, Amina! How are you?
Amina: Hello, Arman! I'm fine, thank you. And you?
Arman: I'm good, thanks!
fields.vocabulary:
How are you? – Қалың қалай? / Қалайсың?
I'm fine – Жақсымын
I'm good – Жақсымын
Thank you / Thanks – Рақмет
And you? – Ал сен ше?
I'm OK – Менде бәрі жақсы
Great – Керемет
Not bad – Жаман емес
Happy – Бақытты
Sad – Мұңды, көңілсіз
fields.grammar:
Қалайсың деп сұрағанда:

How are you? – Қалың қалай?

Жауап беру формалары:

I'm fine. (Жақсымын.)

I'm good. (Жақсымын.)

I'm OK. (Менде бәрі жақсы.)

Not bad. (Жаман емес.)

Great! (Керемет!)

"Рақмет" айту үшін қолданылатын сөздер:

Thank you (ресми)

Thanks (бейресми)
fields.dialogue:
Arman: Hi, how are you?
Amina: I'm fine, thank you. And you?
Arman: I'm good, thanks!

fields.title: My name is..., What's your name?
fields.content:
Hello! My name is Sara. What's your name?
Hi, Sara! I'm Alikhan. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, Alikhan.
fields.vocabulary:
What's your name? – Сенің атың кім?
My name is... – Менің атым...
I’m... – Мен...
Nice to meet you – Танысқаныма қуаныштымын
Too – да, де
Your – сенің
Name – ат
fields.grammar:
Өз есіміңді айту және сұрау үшін:

My name is ...

I'm ...

Басқа адамның есімін сұрау:

What's your name?
fields.dialogue:
Sara: Hello! What's your name?
Alikhan: Hi! My name is Alikhan. And you?
Sara: I'm Sara. Nice to meet you!
Alikhan: Nice to meet you too.

fields.content: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!
fields.vocabulary:
0 – zero
1 – one
2 – two
3 – three
4 – four
5 – five
6 – six
7 – seven
8 – eight
9 – nine
10 – ten
fields.grammar:
Сандарды есте сақтау үшін қайталап үйрену керек.

One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Count from one to five!
Student: One, two, three, four, five!
Teacher: Great job!

fields.content: Let's count! Eleven, twelve, thirteen, fourteen, fifteen... twenty, thirty, forty, fifty... one hundred!
fields.vocabulary:
11 – eleven
12 – twelve
13 – thirteen
14 – fourteen
15 – fifteen
20 – twenty
30 – thirty
40 – forty
50 – fifty
60 – sixty
70 – seventy
80 – eighty
90 – ninety
100 – one hundred
fields.grammar:
Ондықтар:

twenty-one (21)

thirty-two (32)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's twenty plus ten?
Student: Thirty!

fields.title: How old are you?
fields.content: Hi! I'm Amina. I'm eight years old. How old are you?
fields.vocabulary:
How old are you? – Жасың нешеде?

I am ... years old – Менің жасым...

Year – жыл

Old – ескі, жас (жасына қатысты)
fields.grammar:
Жасты айту үшін:

I'm ten years old.
fields.dialogue:
Ali: How old are you, Amina?
Amina: I'm eight years old. And you?
Ali: I'm ten.

fields.title: Where are you from?
fields.content: Hello, I'm from Kazakhstan. I'm Kazakh. Where are you from?
fields.vocabulary:
Country – Ел

From – -дан, -ден

Kazakhstan – Қазақстан

Kazakh – Қазақ

City – қала

Village – ауыл
fields.grammar:
Өз еліңді айту үшін:

I'm from Kazakhstan.

Ұлтыңды айту үшін:

I'm Kazakh.
fields.dialogue:
Tom: Where are you from, Marat?
Marat: I'm from Kazakhstan. And you?
Tom: I'm from America.

fields.title: My family
fields.content: This is my family. This is my father, mother, sister, and brother.
fields.vocabulary:
Family – отбасы

Father – әке

Mother – ана

Brother – аға, іні

Sister – әпке, қарындас

Grandfather – ата

Grandmother – әже

Parents – ата-ана
fields.grammar:
Отбасы мүшелерін таныстырғанда қолданылады:

This is my father.

These are my parents.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Who is this?
Student: This is my mother.

fields.title: Friends
fields.content: I have many friends. My best friend is Arman. He is kind and funny.
fields.vocabulary:
Friend – дос

Best friend – ең жақын дос

Kind – мейірімді

Funny – көңілді

Smart – ақылды

Happy – бақытты
fields.grammar:
Досың туралы айту үшін:

My friend is funny.

He/she is smart.
fields.dialogue:
Asel: Who is your best friend?
Alua: My best friend is Zhanar. She is kind.

fields.title: About me
fields.content: Hello! I'm Asel. I'm nine years old. I'm from Almaty. I like cats.
fields.vocabulary:
About me – Мен туралы

Live – тұру, өмір сүру

Like – ұнату

Cat – мысық

Dog – ит

City – қала
fields.grammar:
Қарапайым таныстыру үлгісі:

I'm Asel.

I'm nine.

I'm from Almaty.

I like cats.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Tell me about yourself!
Student: I'm Asel. I'm from Astana. I like dogs.

fields.title: Days of the Week
fields.content:
There are seven days in a week: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday are weekdays. Saturday and Sunday are weekends.
I go to school from Monday to Friday. On Saturday and Sunday, I play with my friends.
fields.vocabulary:
Monday – Дүйсенбі

Tuesday – Сейсенбі

Wednesday – Сәрсенбі

Thursday – Бейсенбі

Friday – Жұма

Saturday – Сенбі

Sunday – Жексенбі

Weekdays – жұмыс күндері

Weekend – демалыс күндері

Week – апта
fields.grammar:
Апта күндері алдында on қолданылады.

Мысалы:

I play football on Sunday.

We go to school on Monday.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's your favorite day?
Student: My favorite day is Saturday because I play football.

fields.title: Months and Seasons
fields.content:
There are twelve months in a year: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, and December.
We have four seasons: winter, spring, summer, and autumn. In summer, the weather is hot. In winter, it is cold. My favorite month is July because I have holidays.
fields.vocabulary:
January – Қаңтар

February – Ақпан

March – Наурыз

April – Сәуір

May – Мамыр

June – Маусым

July – Шілде

August – Тамыз

September – Қыркүйек

October – Қазан

November – Қараша

December – Желтоқсан

Winter – қыс

Spring – көктем

Summer – жаз

Autumn – күз
fields.grammar:
Айлар мен мезгілдер алдында in қолданылады.

Мысалы:

My birthday is in May.

We swim in summer.
fields.dialogue:
Asel: What's your favorite season?
Alikhan: My favorite season is winter because I like snow.

fields.title: Colors
fields.content: My favorite color is blue. The sky is blue, the grass is green, the sun is yellow. Apples are red or green. Bananas are yellow. Chocolate is brown. I like colorful pictures.
fields.vocabulary:
Blue – көк

Red – қызыл

Green – жасыл

Yellow – сары

Black – қара

White – ақ

Brown – қоңыр

Orange – қызғылт сары

Pink – алқызыл

Purple – күлгін

Colorful – түрлі түсті
fields.grammar:
Түсті сипаттағанда түс зат есімнің алдында келеді.

Мысалы:

a blue sky

a red apple
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What color is your bag?
Student: My bag is black.

fields.title: Shapes and Sizes
fields.content: Shapes can be different. A ball is round. A book is rectangular. A box can be square. Some things are big, and some are small. My ball is big, and my sister’s ball is small.
fields.vocabulary:
Shape – пішін

Round – дөңгелек

Square – шаршы

Rectangle – тік төртбұрыш

Triangle – үшбұрыш

Big – үлкен

Small – кішкентай

Long – ұзын

Short – қысқа

Size – өлшем, көлем
fields.grammar:
Сын есімдер зат есімнің алдында орналасады.

Мысалы:

a big house

a small box
fields.dialogue:
Asel: Look! This table is rectangular.
Teacher: Yes, and the clock is round.

fields.title: Telling the Time
fields.content: We look at the clock to know the time. In the morning, I wake up at seven o'clock. I go to school at eight o'clock. At twelve o'clock, I have lunch. In the evening, at nine o'clock, I go to bed.
fields.vocabulary:
Clock – сағат

Time – уақыт

O'clock – тура сағат

Minute – минут

Hour – сағат (60 минут)

Half past – жарым

Morning – таң

Evening – кеш
fields.grammar:
Сағат айту үшін:

It’s seven o’clock. (Сағат жеті)

It’s half past two. (Сағат екі жарым)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What time is it?
Student: It’s nine o'clock.

fields.title: Parts of the Day
fields.content: In the morning, we eat breakfast. In the afternoon, we have lunch. In the evening, we have dinner. At night, we sleep. My favorite part of the day is evening because I play games with my brother.
fields.vocabulary:
Morning – таңертең

Afternoon – түс

Evening – кеш

Night – түн

Breakfast – таңғы ас

Lunch – түскі ас

Dinner – кешкі ас

Sleep – ұйықтау
fields.grammar:
«In» — parts of the day алдында қолданылады:

in the morning, in the evening «At» — night сөзімен қолданылады:

at night
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you do in the evening?
Student: In the evening, I watch TV.

fields.title: Personal Pronouns
fields.content: I'm Alikhan. You are Amina. He is my brother. She is my sister. We are students. They are teachers.
fields.vocabulary:
I – мен

You – сен, сіз

He – ол (ұл)

She – ол (қыз)

It – ол (зат, жануар)

We – біз

They – олар
fields.grammar:
Жіктеу есімдіктері сөйлем басында қолданылады.

Мысалы:

She is happy.

They are students.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Who is she?
Student: She is my friend.

fields.title: What are nouns?
fields.content: Nouns are words for people, animals, places, and things. A boy, a cat, a city, and a book are nouns. My cat is white. My book is interesting.
fields.vocabulary:
Noun – зат есім

People – адамдар

Animal – жануар

Place – орын

Thing – зат
fields.grammar:
Зат есім заттар мен тіршілік иелерін білдіреді.

Мысалы:

Cat, book, city

My book is new.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Tell me two nouns!
Student: Table and dog.

fields.title: Basic adjectives: big, small, happy, sad
fields.content: My name is Amina. I have a big family. My father is tall and strong. My mother is kind and beautiful. My little brother is small and funny. My grandfather is old but very healthy. My grandmother is nice and friendly. I have many friends. My best friend Aliya is always happy. Sometimes I feel sad, but my family and friends always help me.
fields.vocabulary:
Big – үлкен

Small – кішкентай

Happy – бақытты

Sad – мұңды, көңілсіз

Tall – ұзын (бойы)

Strong – күшті

Beautiful – әдемі

Funny – көңілді, күлкілі

Old – қарт, ескі

Healthy – дені сау
fields.grammar:
Сын есімдер (Adjectives) – заттың немесе адамның қандай екенін сипаттайтын сөздер. Сын есімдер зат есімнің алдына қойылады.

Мысалдар:

I have a big family.

My friend is happy today.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Amina, tell me about your family.
Amina: My family is big. My father is tall and strong, and my mother is beautiful and kind.
Teacher: What about your brother?
Amina: My brother is small and very funny.
Teacher: Who is your best friend?
Amina: My best friend is Aliya. She is always happy.
Teacher: Are you sometimes sad?
Amina: Yes, sometimes I'm sad, but my family helps me feel better.

fields.title: Animals
fields.content: I love animals. I have a dog and a cat. My dog is big and brown. He is very friendly and smart. My cat is small and white. She is calm but playful. In the zoo, there are many animals. Lions are strong and dangerous. Monkeys are funny and smart. Elephants are big and grey. Rabbits are small and cute. Animals are amazing!
fields.vocabulary:
Animal – жануар

Dog – ит

Cat – мысық

Friendly – мейірімді, достыққа бейім

Smart – ақылды

Calm – сабырлы

Playful – ойнақы

Dangerous – қауіпті

Cute – сүйкімді

Amazing – ғажайып, таңғажайып
fields.grammar:
Жануарларды сипаттау кезінде сын есімдерді пайдаланамыз. Олар жануарлардың түрі мен мінезін білдіреді.

Мысалдар:

The dog is big and friendly.

Lions are dangerous animals.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Do you have pets, Arman?
Arman: Yes, I have a dog and a cat. My dog is big and very friendly.
Teacher: Tell me about your cat.
Arman: My cat is small, calm, and playful.
Teacher: What animals do you like at the zoo?
Arman: I like monkeys and elephants. Monkeys are funny, and elephants are big and smart.
Teacher: What animal do you think is cute?
Arman: I think rabbits are very cute.

fields.title: To be етістігі (am/is/are)
fields.content: My name is Amina. I am nine years old. My brother’s name is Arman. He is eleven years old. We are from Kazakhstan. My father is a teacher. My mother is a doctor. They are very kind. My cat is white and small.
fields.vocabulary:
To be – болу (am/is/are)

Name – ат, есім

Old – жас, жаста

Brother – аға, іні

From – -дан, -ден

Teacher – мұғалім

Doctor – дәрігер

Kind – мейірімді

White – ақ

Small – кішкентай
fields.grammar:
"To be" етістігі субъектке байланысты өзгеріп отырады:

I → am

He/She/It → is

We/You/They → are

Мысалдар:

I am a student.

They are happy.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How old are you?
Student: I am nine years old.
Teacher: Where are you from?
Student: I am from Kazakhstan.

fields.title: Negative with "to be"
fields.content: I am not ten years old. My name is not Alikhan. My mother is not a teacher. My cat is not big. My friends are not sad. They are happy. Today is not Saturday. It is Monday.
fields.vocabulary:
Not – емес, жоқ

Sad – көңілсіз

Happy – бақытты

Big – үлкен

Today – бүгін

Monday – дүйсенбі

Saturday – сенбі

Friend – дос

Mother – ана

Ten – он
fields.grammar:
Болымсыз сөйлемдерді am/is/are + not арқылы жасаймыз:

Мысалдар:

She is not sad.

They are not students.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Is today Sunday?
Student: No, it is not Sunday. It is Monday.
Teacher: Is your cat big?
Student: No, it is not big. It is small.

fields.title: "to be" questions
fields.content: Are you happy today? Is your mother a doctor? Is your brother ten years old? Are your friends at school? Is your cat white?
fields.vocabulary:
Question – сұрақ

Happy – бақытты

Mother – ана

Doctor – дәрігер

Brother – аға, іні

Friend – дос

At school – мектепте

White – ақ

Today – бүгін

Year – жыл
fields.grammar:
Сұрақ қою үшін am/is/are сөйлемнің басына шығады:

Мысалдар:

Are you happy?

Is your cat small?
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Are you students?
Students: Yes, we are.
Teacher: Is your teacher kind?
Students: Yes, she is very kind.

fields.title: Present Simple
fields.content: I go to school every day. My brother plays football. My mother cooks delicious food. My father reads books every evening. We watch TV after dinner.
fields.vocabulary:
Go – бару

Play – ойнау

Cook – тамақ жасау

Delicious – дәмді

Food – тамақ

Read – оқу

Book – кітап

Every day – күн сайын

Watch – көру

After – кейін
fields.grammar:
Present Simple шақта үшінші жақ (he/she/it) етістігіне -s/-es жалғанады:

Мысалдар:

She likes apples.

He watches TV.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you do every day?
Student: I go to school and play with friends.
Teacher: What does your mother do every day?
Student: She cooks delicious food.

fields.title: Present Simple (don't, doesn't)
fields.content: I don't like tea. My brother doesn't play basketball. My mother doesn't work on Sundays. We don't eat pizza every day.
fields.vocabulary:
Don't – істемеймін (do not)

Doesn't – істемейді (does not)

Like – ұнату

Tea – шай

Play – ойнау

Basketball – баскетбол

Work – жұмыс істеу

Sunday – жексенбі

Eat – тамақ жеу

Pizza – пицца
fields.grammar:
Present Simple болымсыз формасы don't (I/we/you/they) немесе doesn't (he/she/it) арқылы жасалады.

Мысалдар:

He doesn't read books.

They don't go to school on Sunday.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Do you play basketball?
Student: No, I don't. I play football.
Teacher: Does your sister drink tea?
Student: No, she doesn't.

fields.title: Present Simple (Do...? Does...?)
fields.content: Do you speak English? Does your brother like apples? Do your parents work every day? Does your cat sleep a lot?
fields.vocabulary:
Do – істейсің бе?

Does – істей ме?

Speak – сөйлеу

English – ағылшын тілі

Brother – аға, іні

Parent – ата-ана

Work – жұмыс істеу

Sleep – ұйықтау

A lot – көп

Like – ұнату
fields.grammar:
Сұрақ Present Simple-да Do/Does арқылы басталады:

Мысалдар:

Do you like apples?

Does she speak English?
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Do you speak English?
Student: Yes, I do.
Teacher: Does your father cook?
Student: Yes, he does.

fields.title: Present Simple (often, sometimes, always, never)
fields.content: I always get up early. My brother often plays football after school. My sister sometimes reads books. My friend never eats fish. We always have dinner together. My parents often watch TV at night.
fields.vocabulary:
Always – әрқашан

Often – жиі

Sometimes – кейде

Never – ешқашан

Get up – ояну, тұру

Early – ерте

Fish – балық

Together – бірге

Dinner – кешкі ас

After – кейін
fields.grammar:
Жиілікті білдіретін сөздер сөйлем ішінде етістіктің алдында келеді.

Мысалдар:

I always eat breakfast.

He never drinks coffee.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How often do you read books?
Student: I sometimes read books.
Teacher: Do you often watch TV?
Student: No, I never watch TV.

fields.title: My Daily Routine – Present Simple
fields.content: I get up at seven o'clock every day. Then I wash my face and have breakfast. At eight o'clock, I go to school. After school, I do my homework and play with my friends. In the evening, I have dinner with my family. I go to bed at nine o'clock.
fields.vocabulary:
Get up – тұру, ояну

Wash – жуу

Face – бет

Have breakfast – таңғы ас ішу

Homework – үй тапсырмасы

Go to bed – ұйықтауға бару

Play – ойнау

Evening – кеш

Family – отбасы

After – кейін
fields.grammar:
Күнделікті әрекеттерді айту үшін Present Simple шақ қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I do homework every day.

My friend plays football after school.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What time do you get up?
Student: I get up at seven o'clock.
Teacher: Do you do homework every day?
Student: Yes, I do homework every day.

fields.title: Қарапайым модаль етістік: "Can"
fields.content: I can swim very well. My brother can play football. My sister can sing beautifully. My friend can draw nice pictures. We can speak English. Birds can fly. Fish can swim.
fields.vocabulary:
Can – істей аламын

Swim – жүзу

Play – ойнау

Sing – ән айту

Beautifully – әдемі, керемет

Draw – сурет салу

Picture – сурет

Speak – сөйлеу

Bird – құс

Fly – ұшу
fields.grammar:
"Can" етістігі қабілетті білдіреді және барлық тұлғаға бірдей қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I can sing.

She can swim.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Can you swim?
Student: Yes, I can.
Teacher: Can your sister draw?
Student: Yes, she can draw very well.

fields.title: "Can" (Can you...? Yes, I can. No, I can't.)
fields.content:
Can you speak English? — Yes, I can.
Can your mother cook delicious food? — Yes, she can.
Can your cat fly? — No, it can't.
Can your father swim? — No, he can't.
fields.vocabulary:
Can – істей ала ма?

Yes – иә

No – жоқ

Cook – тамақ пісіру

Delicious – дәмді

Food – тамақ

Swim – жүзу

Fly – ұшу

Father – әке

Speak – сөйлеу
fields.grammar:
Сұрақ қою үшін "can" сөйлем басында қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

Can you swim? – Yes, I can.

Can your sister fly? – No, she can't.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Can you speak English?
Student: Yes, I can.
Teacher: Can a cat fly?
Student: No, it can't. Cats can't fly!

fields.title: Fruits
fields.content: I love fruits. My favorite fruits are apples, bananas, and strawberries. Apples are red or green. Bananas are yellow and sweet. Strawberries are red and tasty. My sister likes oranges. My mother buys fruits every day because they are healthy.
fields.vocabulary:
Fruit – жеміс

Apple – алма

Banana – банан

Strawberry – құлпынай

Orange – апельсин

Sweet – тәтті

Red – қызыл

Yellow – сары

Tasty – дәмді

Healthy – пайдалы, денсаулыққа пайдалы
fields.grammar:
"Like" етістігімен жемістерді ұнатуды айтуға болады:

Мысалдар:

I like bananas.

She likes strawberries.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's your favorite fruit?
Student: My favorite fruit is banana. It's sweet and tasty.

fields.title: Vegetables
fields.content: Vegetables are good for our health. Carrots are orange. Potatoes are brown. Tomatoes are red. Cucumbers are green. My mother cooks delicious vegetable soup every Sunday. I like eating vegetables.
fields.vocabulary:
Vegetable – көкөніс

Carrot – сәбіз

Potato – картоп

Tomato – қызанақ

Cucumber – қияр

Onion – пияз

Soup – сорпа

Cook – дайындау

Eat – жеу

Delicious – дәмді
fields.grammar:
Көкөністер туралы сөйлемдерді құру үшін Present Simple шақ қолданылады:

Мысалдар:

My sister likes carrots.

We eat potatoes every day.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Do you like vegetables?
Student: Yes, I do. I like tomatoes and cucumbers.

fields.title: Food and Drinks
fields.content: I have breakfast every morning. For breakfast, I eat bread, eggs, and cheese. I drink tea or milk. My father drinks coffee. At lunch, we eat meat or fish with vegetables. We drink juice or water.
fields.vocabulary:
Bread – нан

Egg – жұмыртқа

Cheese – ірімшік

Tea – шай

Milk – сүт

Coffee – кофе

Meat – ет

Fish – балық

Juice – шырын

Water – су
fields.grammar:
Тағамдар мен сусындармен қолданылатын етістіктер:

Мысалдар:

I eat bread.

He drinks juice.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you drink for breakfast?
Student: I drink tea or milk. I don't drink coffee.

fields.title: Eating habits
fields.content: Every morning I have breakfast at seven o'clock. For lunch, I eat at school with my friends. We usually eat sandwiches or soup. Dinner is at seven o'clock. My family eats together.
fields.vocabulary:
Breakfast – таңғы ас

Lunch – түскі ас

Dinner – кешкі ас

Sandwich – бутерброд

Usually – әдетте

Eat – жеу

Together – бірге

At school – мектепте

Morning – таңертең

Evening – кеш
fields.grammar:
Уақытты білдіру үшін "at" қолданамыз:

Мысалдар:

I have breakfast at eight o'clock.

We have dinner at seven.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: When do you have lunch?
Student: I have lunch at one o'clock.

fields.title: Clothes
fields.content: Today, I'm wearing a white shirt and blue jeans. My sister wears a red dress. My brother likes to wear a T-shirt and shorts. In winter, I wear a jacket, boots, and gloves.
fields.vocabulary:
Shirt – жейде

Jeans – джинсы

Dress – көйлек

T-shirt – футболка

Shorts – шорты

Jacket – күрте

Boots – етік

Gloves – қолғап

Wear – кию

White – ақ
fields.grammar:
"To wear" – киім кию деген мағына береді:

Мысалдар:

She wears a red dress.

I wear jeans every day.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are you wearing today?
Student: I'm wearing jeans and a T-shirt.

fields.title: Describing clothes
fields.content: My jacket is big and warm. My shoes are new. My sister has a beautiful dress. My T-shirt is blue, and my shorts are black. My clothes are comfortable.
fields.vocabulary:
Jacket – күрте

Shoes – аяқ киім

Beautiful – әдемі

Comfortable – ыңғайлы

New – жаңа

Warm – жылы

Old – ескі

Big – үлкен

Small – кішкентай

Black – қара
fields.grammar:
Сын есімдер зат есімнің алдында қолданылады:

Мысалдар:

A beautiful dress

Comfortable shoes
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Is your jacket new?
Student: Yes, it’s new and warm.

fields.title: My home
fields.content: My home is beautiful and cozy. I live in a big house. There are four rooms: a living room, a kitchen, two bedrooms, and a bathroom. My favorite room is my bedroom. It is small but comfortable. I play, study, and sleep there.
fields.vocabulary:
Home – үй

House – жеке үй

Room – бөлме

Living room – қонақ бөлме

Kitchen – ас үй

Bedroom – жатын бөлме

Bathroom – жуынатын бөлме

Cozy – жайлы

Comfortable – ыңғайлы

Beautiful – әдемі
fields.grammar:
"There is" және "there are" – бір нәрсенің бар екенін білдіреді:

Мысалдар:

There is a kitchen in my house.

There are two bedrooms in my home.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How many rooms are there in your home?
Student: There are four rooms in my home.

fields.title: Furniture in the house
fields.content: In our living room, there is a sofa, two armchairs, and a table. In my bedroom, there is a bed, a desk, and a chair. In the kitchen, we have a refrigerator, a stove, and a table with chairs. Our furniture is new and comfortable.
fields.vocabulary:
Furniture – жиһаз

Sofa – диван

Armchair – кресло

Table – үстел

Bed – төсек

Desk – жазу үстелі

Chair – орындық

Refrigerator (fridge) – тоңазытқыш

Stove – пеш

New – жаңа
fields.grammar:
"In" сөзі бөлме атауларының алдында қолданылады:

Мысалдар:

There is a sofa in the living room.

There is a bed in my bedroom.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What furniture is in your bedroom?
Student: There is a bed, a desk, and a chair in my bedroom.

fields.title: Describing my room
fields.content: My room is small but beautiful. The walls are white. There is a blue carpet on the floor. My bed is near the window. My desk is next to my bed. On the desk, there are books and pencils. I love my room.
fields.vocabulary:
Room – бөлме

Wall – қабырға

Carpet – кілем

Floor – еден

Bed – төсек

Window – терезе

Desk – жазу үстелі

Book – кітап

Pencil – қарындаш

Near – жанында, қасында
fields.grammar:
Орынды білдіретін тіркестер:

near – жанында

next to – қасында

Мысалдар:

My desk is next to my bed.

My bed is near the window.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where is your desk?
Student: My desk is next to my bed.

fields.title: Everyday Activities
fields.content: Every day I get up at seven o’clock. Then I wash my face, brush my teeth, and eat breakfast. At eight o'clock, I go to school. After school, I do my homework, play with my friends, and watch cartoons. At nine o’clock, I go to bed.
fields.vocabulary:
Get up – тұру, ояну

Wash face – бетті жуу

Brush teeth – тісті тазалау

Eat breakfast – таңғы ас ішу

Do homework – үй тапсырмасын жасау

Play – ойнау

Watch cartoons – мультфильм көру

Go to bed – ұйықтауға жату

Every day – күн сайын

Then – содан кейін
fields.grammar:
Күнделікті қайталанатын іс-әрекеттерді Present Simple шақ арқылы айтамыз.

Мысалдар:

I get up at seven o'clock.

She brushes her teeth every morning.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you do after school?
Student: After school, I do my homework and play with my friends.

fields.title: School Items
fields.content: In my school bag, I have a notebook, a pencil, a pen, an eraser, and a ruler. My notebook is blue, and my pencil is yellow. My friend has scissors, glue, and colored pencils. We use these things every day at school.
fields.vocabulary:
School bag – мектеп сөмкесі

Notebook – дәптер

Pencil – қарындаш

Pen – қалам

Eraser – өшіргіш

Ruler – сызғыш

Scissors – қайшы

Glue – желім

Colored pencils – түрлі-түсті қарындаштар

Use – қолдану
fields.grammar:
Have / has – бір нәрсенің бар екенін білдіреді.

Мысалдар:

I have a notebook.

My friend has scissors.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What is in your school bag, Marat?
Marat: I have two notebooks, pencils, and an eraser.
Teacher: Good! What color is your notebook?
Marat: My notebook is blue.
Teacher: Do you have scissors?
Marat: No, I don't have scissors. But my friend Amina has scissors.
Teacher: Great!

fields.title: In the Classroom
fields.content: In our classroom, there is a blackboard, desks, chairs, and a clock. Our teacher writes on the blackboard. Students sit at their desks. We study, read books, and write sentences. Our classroom is big and clean.
fields.vocabulary:
Classroom – сынып

Blackboard – тақта

Desk – парта

Chair – орындық

Clock – сағат

Write – жазу

Sit – отыру

Study – оқу

Read – оқу

Clean – таза
fields.grammar:
"In" – бөлменің ішінде екенін білдіреді.

Мысалдар:

We sit in the classroom.

The teacher writes on the blackboard.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do we do in the classroom, Aliya?
Aliya: We study, read, and write in the classroom.
Teacher: Very good! And where do you sit?
Aliya: I sit at my desk.
Teacher: What does the teacher do?
Aliya: The teacher writes on the blackboard and explains lessons.

fields.title: School Subjects
fields.content: At school, we have many subjects. My favorite subject is English. I also like Math and Music. My brother likes History and Geography. My friend Amina loves Art because she likes to draw.
fields.vocabulary:
Subject – пән

English – ағылшын тілі

Math – математика

Music – музыка

History – тарих

Geography – география

Art – сурет сабағы

Favorite – сүйікті

Lesson – сабақ

Draw – сурет салу
fields.grammar:
Ұнатуды білдіретін "like/love":

Мысалдар:

I like Math.

She loves Art.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What is your favorite subject, Asel?
Asel: My favorite subject is Music. I like singing.
Teacher: What about you, Nurzhan?
Nurzhan: I like History. It's very interesting.
Teacher: Great! And what subject does your friend like?
Nurzhan: My friend likes Math because he is good at counting.

fields.title: Office Items
fields.content: In my father's office, there is a computer, a printer, paper, and pens. He also has a phone and a calendar. My mother uses a laptop and notebooks at work. Office items help them to do their jobs.
fields.vocabulary:
Office – кеңсе

Computer – компьютер

Printer – принтер

Paper – қағаз

Phone – телефон

Calendar – күнтізбе

Laptop – ноутбук

Job – жұмыс

Help – көмектесу

Use – қолдану
fields.grammar:
"There is" – жалғыз зат үшін, "there are" – көпше зат үшін қолданылады:

Мысалдар:

There is a computer in the office.

There are pens on the desk.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's in your father's office, Timur?
Timur: There is a computer, a printer, and a calendar.
Teacher: Does he have a phone?
Timur: Yes, he has a phone on his desk.
Teacher: And what does your mother use at work?
Timur: My mother uses a laptop and notebooks.

fields.title: Jobs
fields.content: My father is a doctor. He works in a hospital. My mother is a teacher. She works at school. My uncle is a driver. He drives a bus. My aunt is a cook. She cooks tasty food in a restaurant. All jobs are important.
fields.vocabulary:
Job – мамандық

Doctor – дәрігер

Hospital – аурухана

Teacher – мұғалім

Driver – жүргізуші

Bus – автобус

Cook – аспаз

Restaurant – мейрамхана

Important – маңызды

Work – жұмыс істеу
fields.grammar:
Жұмыс туралы айтқанда "to be" етістігін қолданамыз:

Мысалдар:

He is a doctor.

She is a cook.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What is your father's job, Alua?
Alua: My father is a driver. He drives a big bus.
Teacher: Interesting! And your mother?
Alua: She is a cook. She works in a restaurant.
Teacher: Does she cook tasty food?
Alua: Yes, she cooks very delicious food.
Teacher: Wonderful! All jobs are important.

fields.title: Places in the City
fields.content: My city is big and beautiful. There are many places: parks, schools, hospitals, shops, and cafes. I often go to the park with my family. My mother buys food in the supermarket. My father works at the hospital. My school is near my home.
fields.vocabulary:
City – қала

Park – саябақ

School – мектеп

Hospital – аурухана

Shop – дүкен

Cafe – кафе

Supermarket – супермаркет

Near – жақын

Buy – сатып алу

Work – жұмыс істеу
fields.grammar:
"Go to" – бір жерге бару туралы айтқанда қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I go to school every day.

My mother goes to the supermarket.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What places are in your city, Anar?
Anar: There are parks, schools, shops, and hospitals.
Teacher: Do you often go to the park?
Anar: Yes, I often go to the park with my family.
Teacher: Where does your father work?
Anar: He works at the hospital.

fields.title: Present Continuous: дәл қазір не істеп жатырмын?
fields.content: Look! My sister is reading a book. My brother is playing football now. My mother is cooking dinner in the kitchen. I am doing my homework. We are enjoying the evening.
fields.vocabulary:
Now – қазір

Read – оқу

Play – ойнау

Cook – дайындау

Do – жасау

Homework – үй тапсырмасы

Enjoy – ләззат алу

Evening – кеш

Look – қарау

Kitchen – ас үй
fields.grammar:
Present Continuous дәл қазір болып жатқан әрекетті білдіреді. Құрылымы: am/is/are + етістік + ing.

Мысалдар:

She is reading a book.

They are playing football.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are you doing now, Dinara?
Dinara: I'm doing my homework.
Teacher: Good! What about your sister?
Dinara: She is reading a book.
Teacher: And your mother?
Dinara: She is cooking dinner.

fields.title: Present Simple vs. Present Continuous
fields.content: I usually play football after school (Present Simple). But today, I'm playing basketball (Present Continuous). My sister always reads books in the evening, but now she is watching TV.
fields.vocabulary:
Usually – әдетте

Always – әрқашан

Today – бүгін

Watch – көру

Basketball – баскетбол

Football – футбол

Read – оқу

Play – ойнау

Evening – кеш

After – кейін
fields.grammar:
Present Simple – әдеттегі іс-әрекеттер.

Present Continuous – дәл қазіргі уақыттағы әрекеттер.

Мысалдар:

I play football every day. (күнделікті)

I'm playing football now. (дәл қазір)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you usually do after school?
Student: I usually play football.
Teacher: What are you doing now?
Student: I'm studying English.

fields.title: Past Simple: was/were
fields.content: Yesterday was Sunday. The weather was nice. My family and I were in the park. I was happy. My friends were also there. It was a beautiful day.
fields.vocabulary:
Yesterday – кеше

Sunday – жексенбі

Weather – ауа райы

Nice – жақсы, тамаша

Happy – бақытты

Beautiful – әдемі

Also – сондай-ақ

There – сонда

Day – күн

Family – отбасы
fields.grammar:
Өткен шақта am/is → was, ал are → were болып өзгереді.

Мысалдар:

I was happy yesterday.

We were in the park.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How was your weekend, Nurali?
Nurali: It was great! Yesterday was Sunday, and we were in the park.
Teacher: Was the weather good?
Nurali: Yes, it was very nice. I was happy.

fields.title: Қайталау: өзің туралы, отбасың туралы және күнделікті әрекеттер туралы сөйлеу
fields.content: Hello! My name is Damir. I’m ten years old. I live in Astana. I have a small family. My mother is a teacher, and my father is a doctor. Every day, I get up early, go to school, and play with friends. In the evening, I do homework and read books.
fields.vocabulary:
Name – есім

Family – отбасы

Live – тұру

Teacher – мұғалім

Doctor – дәрігер

Early – ерте

Homework – үй тапсырмасы

Read – оқу

Play – ойнау

Evening – кеш
fields.grammar:
I am ten years old.

My father is a doctor.

I go to school every day.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Tell me about yourself, Damir.
Damir: My name is Damir. I live in Astana. I’m ten years old.
Teacher: Good. Tell me about your family.
Damir: My mother is a teacher, and my father is a doctor.
Teacher: What do you do every day?
Damir: I get up early, go to school, and play with my friends.
Teacher: Very nice! Do you like your school?
Damir: Yes, I like my school very much.

fields.title: Present Simple (қайта шолу)
fields.content: My name is Dias. I wake up at 7 o’clock every morning. I usually have breakfast at home. My mother works at a school, and my father works in an office. I go to school at 8 o’clock. After school, I do homework and play football with my friends.
fields.vocabulary:
wake up – ояну

breakfast – таңғы ас

usually – әдетте

work – жұмыс істеу

office – кеңсе

after – кейін

homework – үй тапсырмасы

play – ойнау

every – әрбір

morning – таңертең
fields.grammar:
Present Simple күнделікті қайталанатын әрекеттер үшін қолданылады.

(I/you/we/they): verb (негізгі форма)

(he/she/it): verb + s/es

Мысалдар:

I go to school every day.

She works in a hospital.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What time do you wake up every day, Dias?
Dias: I wake up at 7 o’clock every morning.
Teacher: Do you have breakfast at home?
Dias: Yes, I usually have breakfast at home.
Teacher: And your mother, does she work?
Dias: Yes, she works at a school.

fields.title: Present Continuous (қайта шолу)
fields.content: Look! It's evening now. My family is busy. My mother is cooking dinner. My father is watching TV. My sister is reading a book. I am doing my English homework. We are enjoying our evening.
fields.vocabulary:
evening – кеш

now – қазір

busy – бос емес

cook – тамақ дайындау

watch – көру

read – оқу

homework – үй тапсырмасы

enjoy – ләззат алу

dinner – кешкі ас

family – отбасы
fields.grammar:
Present Continuous дәл қазір болып жатқан әрекеттер үшін қолданылады. Құрылымы:
am/is/are + verb + ing

Мысалдар:

She is reading a book now.

They are playing football at the moment.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are you doing now, Aigerim?
Aigerim: I'm doing my homework.
Teacher: What's your mother doing?
Aigerim: She is cooking dinner.
Teacher: And your father?
Aigerim: He's watching TV.

fields.title: Present Simple және Present Continuous айырмашылығы
fields.content: I usually drink tea in the morning (Present Simple). But today, I'm drinking coffee (Present Continuous). My sister usually wears a dress, but today she is wearing jeans and a T-shirt. My brother always plays football, but now he is playing basketball.
fields.vocabulary:
usually – әдетте

today – бүгін

drink – ішу

tea – шай

coffee – кофе

wear – кию

dress – көйлек

jeans – джинсы

basketball – баскетбол

always – әрқашан
fields.grammar:
Present Simple күнделікті немесе жиі қайталанатын әрекеттерді білдіреді.

Present Continuous дәл қазіргі уақыттағы ерекше, уақытша әрекеттер үшін қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

She usually reads books. (Present Simple)

She is reading a book now. (Present Continuous)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you usually drink in the morning, Daniyar?
Daniyar: I usually drink tea, but today I'm drinking milk.
Teacher: What does your sister usually wear?
Daniyar: She usually wears a dress, but today she's wearing jeans.

fields.title: My working day
fields.content: I get up at seven o'clock every morning. I wash my face and brush my teeth. Then I have breakfast and go to school. Lessons start at eight o’clock and finish at two o’clock. After school, I do my homework. In the evening, I watch cartoons or play games. I go to bed at nine o’clock.
fields.vocabulary:
working day – жұмыс күні

get up – ояну

wash – жуу

brush teeth – тісті тазалау

breakfast – таңғы ас

lesson – сабақ

finish – аяқталу

watch cartoons – мультфильм көру

go to bed – ұйықтауға жату

evening – кеш
fields.grammar:
Күнделікті іс-әрекеттерді баяндауда Present Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

Lessons start at eight o’clock.

I watch TV in the evening.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What time do your lessons start, Marzhan?
Marzhan: They start at eight o’clock and finish at two o’clock.
Teacher: What do you do after school?
Marzhan: I do my homework, then I watch cartoons or play games.

fields.title: My weekends
fields.content: I love weekends. On Saturday morning, I usually help my mother to clean the house. In the afternoon, I play football with my friends. On Sunday, my family goes to the park or visits grandparents. In the evening, we watch films together. Weekends are fun!
fields.vocabulary:
weekend – демалыс күндері

Saturday – сенбі

Sunday – жексенбі

clean – тазалау

house – үй

afternoon – түс уақытында

grandparents – ата-әже

park – саябақ

film – фильм

fun – көңілді
fields.grammar:
Демалыс күндеріндегі әдеттерді сипаттауда Present Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I usually clean the house on Saturday.

We watch films together every Sunday evening.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you usually do on weekends, Berik?
Berik: On Saturday, I help my mother clean the house. Then I play football with my friends.
Teacher: Do you visit your grandparents?
Berik: Yes, on Sunday we usually visit my grandparents or go to the park.

fields.title: What are you doing now?
fields.content: It is Sunday morning. Right now, my mother is baking a cake in the kitchen. My father is washing his car in the yard. My sister is drawing pictures in her room. I'm watching my favorite cartoon on TV. Everyone is busy doing something interesting.
fields.vocabulary:
Right now – дәл қазір

Bake – пісіру

Cake – торт

Kitchen – ас үй

Wash – жуу

Car – көлік

Yard – аула

Draw – сурет салу

Favorite – сүйікті

Cartoon – мультфильм
fields.grammar:
Present Continuous дәл қазіргі уақыттағы іс-әрекеттерді білдіреді.

Құрылымы:
(am/is/are) + verb + ing

Мысалдар:

My mother is baking a cake now.

They are watching TV right now.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are you doing now, Timur?
Timur: I'm watching a cartoon.
Teacher: What's your mother doing?
Timur: She is baking a cake in the kitchen.
Teacher: And your father?
Timur: He's washing his car in the yard.

fields.title: What is my family doing?
fields.content: It’s evening now. My family is relaxing at home. My father is reading a newspaper. My mother is listening to music. My brother is playing games on his phone. My sister is studying for her exams. I am writing in my diary. We are having a quiet and nice evening together.
fields.vocabulary:
Relax – демалу

Read – оқу

Newspaper – газет

Listen – тыңдау

Music – музыка

Phone – телефон

Study – сабақ оқу

Exam – емтихан

Diary – күнделік

Quiet – тыныш
fields.grammar:
Отбасы мүшелерінің дәл қазіргі әрекеттерін сипаттау үшін Present Continuous қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

My father is reading a newspaper.

My sister is studying for exams.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's your family doing now, Asel?
Asel: My father is reading a newspaper, and my mother is listening to music.
Teacher: What about your brother?
Asel: He’s playing games on his phone.

fields.title: Әдеттер мен дәл қазіргі әрекеттерді бірге сипаттау
fields.content: Usually, I drink tea in the morning. But today, I'm drinking orange juice. My mother usually cooks dinner at 6 o'clock, but today she's cooking at 5. My brother usually plays football after school, but right now he is doing homework.
fields.vocabulary:
Usually – әдетте

Drink – ішу

Orange juice – апельсин шырыны

Cook – тамақ дайындау

Dinner – кешкі ас

Play – ойнау

Football – футбол

Homework – үй тапсырмасы

After school – мектептен кейін

Today – бүгін
fields.grammar:
Present Simple: әдеттер, тұрақты әрекеттер.

Present Continuous: дәл қазіргі кездегі ерекше немесе уақытша әрекеттер.

Мысалдар:

He usually plays football.

Today he is doing homework.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you usually drink in the morning?
Alua: I usually drink tea, but today I’m drinking milk.
Teacher: Does your brother usually play football?
Alua: Yes, but now he's doing homework.

fields.title: Әртүрлі адамдардың күнделікті өмірі
fields.content: My uncle works in a hospital. He starts work early in the morning. My aunt is a teacher. She teaches English at school. My cousin studies at university. She often goes to the library. Every evening, my grandmother watches TV and knits warm socks. Different people do different things every day.
fields.vocabulary:
Uncle – көке, ағай

Hospital – аурухана

Early – ерте

Aunt – тәте, апай

Teach – сабақ беру

Cousin – бөле, немере

University – университет

Library – кітапхана

Knit – тоқу

Warm socks – жылы шұлықтар
fields.grammar:
Күнделікті, қайталанатын әрекеттер үшін Present Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

My aunt teaches English.

My grandmother watches TV every evening.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where does your uncle work?
Student: He works in a hospital.
Teacher: What does your cousin do every day?
Student: She studies at university and goes to the library.

fields.title: Present Simple vs. Present Continuous
fields.content: My friend Ali usually goes to school by bus. But today he is walking because the weather is nice. Usually, I play football after school, but now I'm reading a book because I have a test tomorrow.
fields.vocabulary:
Usually – әдетте

Today – бүгін

Walk – жаяу жүру

Weather – ауа райы

Nice – жақсы

Play – ойнау

Read – оқу

Test – тест

Tomorrow – ертең

Because – себебі
fields.grammar:
Present Simple: әдеттегі іс-әрекеттер (I play, he goes).

Present Continuous: дәл қазіргі әрекеттер (I'm reading, he is walking).

Мысалдар:

He usually goes to school by bus.

Today he is walking.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How do you usually go to school, Ali?
Ali: Usually, I go by bus.
Teacher: And today?
Ali: Today I am walking because the weather is nice.
Teacher: Do you usually play football after school?
Ali: Yes, but now I’m reading a book because I have a test tomorrow.

fields.title: Past Simple: болымды сөйлемдер (тұрақты етістіктер -ed)
fields.content: Yesterday, I visited my grandparents. I helped my grandmother cook dinner. After dinner, we watched a movie. My grandfather talked about his childhood. I enjoyed the day very much.
fields.vocabulary:
yesterday – кеше

visit – бару, келу (visited)

help – көмектесу (helped)

cook – дайындау (cooked)

watch – көру (watched)

movie – фильм

talk – сөйлеу, әңгімелеу (talked)

childhood – балалық шақ

enjoy – ұнату, ләззат алу (enjoyed)

day – күн
fields.grammar:
Past Simple тұрақты етістіктерге -ed жалғануымен жасалады.

Мысалдар:

I visited my grandparents.

We watched a movie.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What did you do yesterday, Samal?
Samal: I visited my grandparents and helped my grandmother cook dinner.
Teacher: Did you watch a movie?
Samal: Yes, we watched a movie together.

fields.title: Past Simple: жиі қолданылатын тұрақты емес етістіктер (went, saw, had)
fields.content: Last weekend, I went to the park with my friends. We saw many beautiful flowers. We had ice cream and played football. It was a fantastic day.
fields.vocabulary:
weekend – демалыс күндері

go – бару (went)

see – көру (saw)

beautiful – әдемі

flower – гүл

have – бар болу, иелену, жеу (had)

ice cream – балмұздақ

play – ойнау (played)

fantastic – керемет

last – өткен
fields.grammar:
Past Simple шақта кейбір етістіктердің формалары өзгереді:

go → went

see → saw

have → had

Мысалдар:

I went to the park.

We saw flowers.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where did you go last weekend?
Student: I went to the park with my friends.
Teacher: What did you see there?
Student: We saw many beautiful flowers.

fields.title: Past Simple: болымсыз сөйлемдер (didn't)
fields.content: Yesterday I didn't go to school because I didn't feel well. My mother didn't go to work. She didn't leave me alone. I didn't play outside. I stayed at home and rested all day.
fields.vocabulary:
feel – сезіну (felt)

well – жақсы

leave – қалдыру, кету (left)

alone – жалғыз

outside – сыртта

stay – қалу, тұру (stayed)

rest – демалу (rested)

all day – күні бойы

because – себебі

yesterday – кеше
fields.grammar:
Past Simple болымсыз сөйлемдері didn't + verb (негізгі форма) арқылы жасалады.

Мысалдар:

I didn't go to school.

My mother didn't leave me alone.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Did you go to school yesterday, Anuar?
Anuar: No, I didn't go to school. I didn't feel well.
Teacher: Did you play outside?
Anuar: No, I didn't. I stayed at home.

fields.title: Past Simple: сұраулы сөйлемдер (Did you...?)
fields.content: Did you go to the cinema last weekend? Did your sister come with you? Did you enjoy the film? Did your parents like it?
fields.vocabulary:
cinema – кинотеатр

come – келу (came)

film – фильм

parents – ата-ана

like – ұнату (liked)

weekend – демалыс күндері

enjoy – ләззат алу

last – өткен

with – бірге

did – (сұрақ қоюға көмектесетін сөз)
fields.grammar:
Past Simple сұраулы сөйлемдері "Did + бастауыш + verb (негізгі форма)?" арқылы жасалады.

Мысалдар:

Did you go to the cinema?

Did she like the film?
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Did you go to the cinema last weekend?
Student: Yes, I did.
Teacher: Did you enjoy the film?
Student: Yes, I enjoyed it very much.

fields.title: What did you do yesterday?
fields.content: Yesterday I woke up at eight o'clock. I brushed my teeth, washed my face, and had breakfast. Then I went to school. After school, I played basketball with my friends. In the evening, I did my homework and went to bed early.
fields.vocabulary:
wake up – ояну (woke up)

brush – тазалау (brushed)

wash – жуу (washed)

breakfast – таңғы ас

play – ойнау (played)

basketball – баскетбол

homework – үй тапсырмасы

early – ерте

bed – төсек

yesterday – кеше
fields.grammar:
Өткен шақтағы күнделікті әрекеттерді сипаттау үшін Past Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I woke up at eight o'clock.

I played basketball after school.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What did you do yesterday, Alina?
Alina: I woke up at eight o'clock, had breakfast, and went to school.
Teacher: Did you play basketball?
Alina: Yes, I played basketball with my friends.
Teacher: And in the evening?
Alina: I did my homework and went to bed early.

fields.title: My last weekend
fields.content: Last weekend was great! On Saturday, I visited my cousin. We played computer games and listened to music. On Sunday, my family and I went to the shopping mall. We bought new clothes, then had lunch at a café. It was fun!
fields.vocabulary:
last weekend – өткен демалыс күндері

cousin – немере аға/қарындас

computer games – компьютерлік ойындар

listen – тыңдау (listened)

music – музыка

shopping mall – сауда орталығы

buy – сатып алу (bought)

clothes – киім

lunch – түскі ас

café – кафе
fields.grammar:
Өткен шақта әрекеттерді сипаттау үшін Past Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I visited my cousin.

We went to the shopping mall.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What did you do last weekend, Kamila?
Kamila: On Saturday, I visited my cousin. We played computer games.
Teacher: Did you go anywhere on Sunday?
Kamila: Yes, we went to the shopping mall and bought new clothes.

fields.title: My last holiday
fields.content: My last holiday was in Almaty. I traveled with my family. We stayed in a nice hotel and visited many beautiful places. We went to the mountains and took many photos. The weather was sunny and warm. I enjoyed the holiday very much!
fields.vocabulary:
holiday – демалыс

travel – саяхаттау (traveled)

hotel – қонақүй

stay – тұру (stayed)

mountain – тау

take – алу, түсіру (took)

photo – сурет

weather – ауа райы

sunny – күн шуақты

warm – жылы
fields.grammar:
Өткен шақтағы оқиғаларды сипаттау үшін Past Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

We traveled to Almaty.

I took many photos.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where did you go on your last holiday, Ali?
Ali: I went to Almaty with my family.
Teacher: Did you stay in a hotel?
Ali: Yes, we stayed in a nice hotel. We visited mountains and took many photos.

fields.title: My last birthday
fields.content: My last birthday was amazing! My parents organized a small party at home. My friends came and gave me many gifts. We played games, sang songs, danced, and ate delicious cake. I was very happy!
fields.vocabulary:
birthday – туған күн

amazing – таңғажайып, керемет

organize – ұйымдастыру (organized)

party – кеш, той

gift – сыйлық

sing – ән айту (sang)

dance – билеу (danced)

delicious – дәмді

cake – торт

happy – бақытты
fields.grammar:
Өткен шақтағы оқиғалар туралы айту үшін Past Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

My friends came and gave me gifts.

We played games and ate cake.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How was your birthday, Zhanar?
Zhanar: It was amazing! My parents organized a small party.
Teacher: Did your friends come?
Zhanar: Yes, they came and gave me many gifts. We danced and ate cake.

fields.title: Storytelling
fields.content: Yesterday, I walked to the park. Suddenly, it started to rain. I ran to find shelter. I waited under a tree until the rain stopped. After that, I continued walking and saw a beautiful rainbow. It was unforgettable!
fields.vocabulary:
walk – жаяу жүру (walked)

park – саябақ

suddenly – кенеттен

start – бастау (started)

rain – жаңбыр жауу

run – жүгіру (ran)

shelter – баспана, ықтасын

wait – күту (waited)

rainbow – кемпірқосақ

unforgettable – ұмытылмас
fields.grammar:
Өткен шақтағы қысқа оқиғаларды баяндағанда Past Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I walked to the park.

It started to rain suddenly.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Tell me a short story about yesterday.
Student: Yesterday, I walked to the park, but suddenly it started to rain.
Teacher: What did you do?
Student: I ran to find shelter and waited until the rain stopped. Then I saw a rainbow.

fields.title: Past Simple барлық формалар
fields.content: Last week, I visited my friend. We didn't go outside because it was cold. We watched movies, played games, and talked a lot. Did you meet your friends last week? Did you enjoy your time?
fields.vocabulary:
visit – бару (visited)

friend – дос

cold – суық

watch – көру (watched)

movie – фильм

play – ойнау (played)

talk – әңгімелесу (talked)

meet – кездесу (met)

enjoy – ләззат алу (enjoyed)

outside – сыртта
fields.grammar:
Past Simple:

Болымды: visited, watched, played.

Болымсыз: didn't + негізгі форма (didn't go).

Сұраулы: Did + бастауыш + негізгі форма? (Did you meet?)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Did you meet your friend last week?
Student: Yes, I visited my friend.
Teacher: Did you play games?
Student: Yes, we played games and watched movies.
Teacher: Did you go outside?
Student: No, we didn't go outside because it was cold.

fields.title: Past Continuous
fields.content: Yesterday evening, at 7 o'clock, I was reading a book. My sister was listening to music. My mother was cooking dinner, and my father was watching TV. We were having a quiet evening at home.
fields.vocabulary:
evening – кеш

read – оқу (reading)

listen – тыңдау (listening)

cook – тамақ дайындау (cooking)

dinner – кешкі ас

watch – көру (watching)

quiet – тыныш

home – үй

yesterday – кеше

music – музыка
fields.grammar:
Past Continuous – өткен шақтың белгілі бір уақытында болып жатқан әрекетті білдіреді.

Құрылымы:
was/were + verb + ing

Мысалдар:

I was reading at 7 o'clock.

They were cooking dinner yesterday evening.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What were you doing yesterday at 7 o'clock, Mira?
Mira: I was reading a book.
Teacher: What was your mother doing?
Mira: She was cooking dinner.

fields.title: Past Continuous vs. Past Simple
fields.content: I was walking home yesterday when I saw my friend. He was riding his bike. We stopped and talked for a few minutes. Then I continued walking home.
fields.vocabulary:
walk – жүру (walking)

see – көру (saw)

friend – дос

ride – тебу, айдау (riding)

bike – велосипед

stop – тоқтау (stopped)

talk – сөйлесу (talked)

minute – минут

continue – жалғастыру (continued)

home – үй
fields.grammar:
Past Continuous – ұзақ жалғасқан әрекеттер. (I was walking)

Past Simple – қысқа, аяқталған әрекеттер. (I saw my friend)

Мысалдар:

I was walking when I saw him.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What were you doing when you saw your friend?
Student: I was walking home.
Teacher: What was your friend doing?
Student: He was riding his bike.

fields.title: What was I doing?
fields.content: At 9 o'clock last night, I was doing homework. My brother was playing games on the computer. My parents were watching a film. Our cat was sleeping on the sofa.
fields.vocabulary:
last night – өткен түн

homework – үй тапсырмасы

play – ойнау (playing)

computer – компьютер

parents – ата-ана

film – фильм

cat – мысық

sleep – ұйықтау (sleeping)

sofa – диван

do – жасау (doing)
fields.grammar:
Past Continuous нақты бір уақыттағы іс-әрекетті сипаттау үшін қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I was doing homework at 9 o'clock.

Our cat was sleeping on the sofa.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What were you doing at 9 o'clock last night, Azamat?
Azamat: I was doing my homework.
Teacher: What was your brother doing?
Azamat: He was playing computer games.

fields.title: Interrupted actions
fields.content: I was having breakfast when the phone rang. My sister was taking a shower when the water stopped. My father was driving to work when his car broke down.
fields.vocabulary:
breakfast – таңғы ас

phone – телефон

ring – шырылдау (rang)

take a shower – душ қабылдау

water – су

stop – тоқтау (stopped)

drive – көлік жүргізу (driving)

car – көлік

break down – бұзылу (broke down)

happen – болу, орын алу (happened)
fields.grammar:
Past Continuous және Past Simple әрекеттер бірге қолданылады:

Ұзақ әрекет: Past Continuous

Қысқа, үзіліс жасайтын әрекет: Past Simple

Мысалдар:

I was having breakfast when the phone rang.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What were you doing when the phone rang?
Student: I was having breakfast.
Teacher: And your father?
Student: He was driving to work when his car broke down.

fields.title: Future Simple (will)
fields.content: Tomorrow is Saturday. I will visit my friend. We will play football and then we will watch a film. My mother will bake a cake. It will be a nice weekend.
fields.vocabulary:
tomorrow – ертең

visit – бару, кездесу

play – ойнау

football – футбол

watch – көру

bake – пісіру

cake – торт

weekend – демалыс күндері

nice – жақсы

friend – дос
fields.grammar:
Future Simple (келешек шақ) – болашақта болатын әрекеттер үшін қолданылады.
Құрылымы: will + verb (негізгі форма)

Мысалдар:

I will visit my friend.

She will bake a cake.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What will you do tomorrow, Aidos?
Aidos: I will visit my friend. We will play football.
Teacher: Will your mother bake a cake?
Aidos: Yes, she will bake a cake for us.

fields.title: Going to: жоспарланған әрекеттер туралы айту
fields.content: I'm going to visit my grandparents this weekend. My sister is going to buy a new phone tomorrow. My parents are going to travel to Astana next month. We are going to have a picnic on Sunday.
fields.vocabulary:
going to – жоспарлау (бір нәрсені істеуге дайындалу)

visit – бару

grandparents – ата-әже

weekend – демалыс күндері

buy – сатып алу

phone – телефон

travel – саяхаттау

next month – келесі ай

picnic – табиғат аясына шығу

Sunday – жексенбі
fields.grammar:
Going to – алдын ала жоспарланған, ниет етілген болашақ әрекеттерді білдіреді.

Құрылымы: am/is/are + going to + verb

Мысалдар:

I'm going to visit my grandparents.

She is going to buy a phone.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are you going to do this weekend, Aliya?
Aliya: I'm going to visit my grandparents.
Teacher: Is your sister going to buy something?
Aliya: Yes, she's going to buy a new phone.

fields.title: My future holiday plans
fields.content: Next summer, I'm going to go to Burabai with my family. We are going to stay in a nice hotel near the lake. I'm going to swim, play games, and enjoy nature. My brother is going to ride a bike. It will be fantastic!
fields.vocabulary:
summer – жаз

Burabai – Бурабай

hotel – қонақүй

lake – көл

swim – жүзу

nature – табиғат

ride – айдау, тебу (көлік, велосипед)

bike – велосипед

fantastic – керемет

stay – тұру (уақытша)
fields.grammar:
Жоспарланған болашақ әрекеттер үшін going to қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I'm going to swim in the lake.

We are going to stay in a nice hotel.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are your plans for the summer, Almas?
Almas: I'm going to go to Burabai.
Teacher: Are you going to swim?
Almas: Yes, I'm going to swim and play games.

fields.title: My future goals
fields.content: In the future, I'm going to become a doctor. I'm going to study hard and help people. My sister is going to become a teacher. She loves children and is going to teach English. We are going to make our parents proud.
fields.vocabulary:
future – болашақ

goal – мақсат

become – болу (бір нәрсеге айналу)

doctor – дәрігер

study – оқу

help – көмектесу

teacher – мұғалім

children – балалар

teach – сабақ беру

proud – мақтан тұтатын
fields.grammar:
Ұзақ мерзімді мақсаттарды білдіруде going to қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I'm going to become a doctor.

She is going to teach English.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What are you going to become in the future, Madina?
Madina: I'm going to become a doctor.
Teacher: And your sister?
Madina: She's going to become a teacher.

fields.title: Predictions
fields.content: Look at the sky. It’s cloudy. I think it will rain soon. It's very late. She will probably miss the bus. Don't worry, everything will be fine.
fields.vocabulary:
sky – аспан

cloudy – бұлтты

rain – жаңбыр

soon – жақында

late – кеш

probably – мүмкін, ықтимал

miss – өткізіп алу, кешігу

bus – автобус

worry – уайымдау

fine – жақсы
fields.grammar:
Болжам жасау үшін Future Simple (will) қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

It will rain soon.

She will miss the bus.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Look at the sky. What will happen soon, Timur?
Timur: It will rain soon.
Teacher: Will your sister catch the bus?
Timur: No, she will probably miss the bus.

fields.title: Past Continuous, will және going to
fields.content: Yesterday at 8 o'clock, I was watching TV. Tomorrow, I will visit my uncle. I'm going to study English hard because I want to speak well. Last weekend, we were having a picnic when it started to rain.
fields.vocabulary:
yesterday – кеше

watch – көру (watching)

visit – бару

uncle – көке

study – оқу

speak – сөйлеу

weekend – демалыс күндері

picnic – пикник

rain – жаңбыр

start – бастау
fields.grammar:
Past Continuous: was/were + verb + ing

Future Simple: will + verb

Going to: am/is/are + going to + verb

Мысалдар:

I was watching TV at 8 o'clock yesterday.

I will visit my uncle tomorrow.

I'm going to study English hard.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What were you doing yesterday at 8 o'clock, Alibek?
Alibek: I was watching TV.
Teacher: What will you do tomorrow?
Alibek: I will visit my uncle.
Teacher: Are you going to study English?
Alibek: Yes, I'm going to study English very hard.

fields.title: Plural nouns: regular -s, -es
fields.content: I have two cats and three dogs. My sister likes apples and oranges. We bought five books yesterday. There are many flowers in our garden.
fields.vocabulary:
cat – мысық (cats)

dog – ит (dogs)

apple – алма (apples)

orange – апельсин (oranges)

book – кітап (books)

flower – гүл (flowers)

garden – бақша

yesterday – кеше

many – көп

buy – сатып алу (bought)
fields.grammar:
Зат есімнің көпше түрі көбіне "-s" немесе "-es" жалғауларымен жасалады.

Мысалдар:

cat → cats

book → books

box → boxes
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How many pets do you have, Adil?
Adil: I have two cats and three dogs.
Teacher: What did you buy yesterday?
Adil: We bought five books.

fields.title: Plural nouns: irregular forms
fields.content: Children play in the park. Men and women walk along the street. My teeth are white. There are many mice in the field.
fields.vocabulary:
child – бала (children)

man – ер адам (men)

woman – әйел адам (women)

tooth – тіс (teeth)

mouse – тышқан (mice)

play – ойнау

park – саябақ

walk – жүру

street – көше

field – дала
fields.grammar:
Кейбір зат есімдердің көпше түрі ерекше өзгереді (irregular plurals).

Мысалдар:

child → children

tooth → teeth

mouse → mice
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where are the children?
Student: They are playing in the park.
Teacher: Who walks along the street?
Student: Men and women walk along the street.

fields.title: Countable (есептелетін) nouns
fields.content: I have three apples and two bananas. My brother bought four pencils. There are many chairs in the classroom. How many books do you have?
fields.vocabulary:
apple – алма

banana – банан

pencil – қарындаш

chair – орындық

classroom – сынып бөлмесі

how many – қанша?

have – бар болу

book – кітап

buy – сатып алу (bought)

many – көп
fields.grammar:
Есептелетін зат есімдерді санмен айтуға болады.

Мысалдар:

three apples

two bananas
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How many pencils did your brother buy?
Student: He bought four pencils.
Teacher: How many chairs are in the classroom?
Student: There are many chairs in the classroom.

fields.title: Uncountable (есептелмейтін) nouns
fields.content: I drink milk every morning. My father drinks coffee. My mother uses sugar for tea. There is some water in the bottle. I need bread for breakfast.
fields.vocabulary:
milk – сүт

coffee – кофе

sugar – қант

tea – шай

water – су

bottle – бөтелке

bread – нан

drink – ішу

use – қолдану

need – қажет ету
fields.grammar:
Есептелмейтін зат есімдерді санмен тікелей айтуға болмайды. Олармен "some" қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

some milk

some water
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What do you drink in the morning?
Student: I drink milk.
Teacher: Does your mother use sugar for tea?
Student: Yes, she uses some sugar.

fields.title: Артикльдер: a, an
fields.content: I have a dog and an apple. My brother saw a bird and an elephant at the zoo. My mother bought a dress and an umbrella yesterday.
fields.vocabulary:
dog – ит

apple – алма

bird – құс

elephant – піл

zoo – зоопарк

dress – көйлек

umbrella – қолшатыр

yesterday – кеше

buy – сатып алу (bought)

have – бар болу
fields.grammar:
"A" дауыссыз дыбыстан басталатын сөздің алдында,
"An" дауысты дыбыстан басталатын сөздің алдында қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

a dog, a bird

an apple, an elephant
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What animals did your brother see at the zoo?
Student: He saw a bird and an elephant.
Teacher: What did your mother buy yesterday?
Student: She bought a dress and an umbrella.

fields.title: Артикльдер: the (қолданылуы)
fields.content: The sun is bright today. The moon is beautiful at night. We visited the museum yesterday. The book on the table is mine.
fields.vocabulary:
sun – күн

bright – жарқын

moon – ай

beautiful – әдемі

night – түн

museum – мұражай

book – кітап

table – үстел

mine – менікі

yesterday – кеше
fields.grammar:
Белгілі бір заттарды немесе бұрын айтылған нәрсені көрсету үшін the артиклі қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

The sun, the moon (жалғыз объектілер)

The book on the table (белгілі кітап)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Is the sun bright today?
Student: Yes, the sun is very bright today.
Teacher: Did you visit the museum?
Student: Yes, we visited the museum yesterday.

fields.title: Артикльдерсіз қолданылатын сөздер (Zero article)
fields.content: I drink water every day. My mother cooks dinner. Cats love milk. People need air to breathe.
fields.vocabulary:
water – су

dinner – кешкі ас

cat – мысық

milk – сүт

people – адамдар

air – ауа

breathe – демалу

love – жақсы көру

cook – тамақ жасау

every day – күн сайын
fields.grammar:
Жалпы түсініктер мен абстрактілі заттар алдында артикль қойылмайды.

Мысалдар:

I drink water. (жалпы)

Cats love milk. (барлық мысықтар)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Do you drink water every day?
Student: Yes, I drink water every day.
Teacher: What do cats love?
Student: Cats love milk.

fields.title: Prepositions of place (in, on, at)
fields.content: My book is on the table. My shoes are under the bed. My family is at home. I live in Almaty. The pencils are in the box.
fields.vocabulary:
book – кітап

table – үстел

shoes – аяқ киім

bed – төсек

family – отбасы

home – үй

live – тұру

pencils – қарындаштар

box – қорап

under – астында
fields.grammar:
Prepositions
on – үстінде

under – астында

at – нақты орында (at home)

in – ішінде, қалада (in the box, in Almaty)

Мысалдар:

My book is on the table.

I live in Almaty.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where are your shoes?
Student: They are under the bed.
Teacher: Where do you live?
Student: I live in Almaty.

fields.title: Prepositions of time (in, on, at)
fields.content: I wake up at 7 o'clock. My birthday is in July. My exam is on Monday. We have holidays in summer. Let's meet at lunchtime.
fields.vocabulary:
wake up – ояну

birthday – туған күн

exam – емтихан

holidays – демалыс күндері

summer – жаз

meet – кездесу

lunchtime – түскі ас уақыты

July – шілде

Monday – дүйсенбі

o'clock – тура сағат
fields.grammar:
Prepositions of time
at нақты уақытпен (at 7 o'clock, at lunchtime)

on күндермен (on Monday)

in айлармен, жыл мезгілдерімен (in July, in summer)

Мысалдар:

I wake up at 7 o'clock.

My birthday is in July.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: When is your birthday?
Student: My birthday is in July.
Teacher: When is your exam?
Student: My exam is on Monday.

fields.title: Қайталау сабағы (Зат есімдер мен артикльдер)
fields.content: I bought apples and oranges. The apples are red, and the oranges are sweet. My brother has a dog. Dogs love to play. My mother cooks dinner at home every evening.
fields.vocabulary:
buy – сатып алу (bought)

apple – алма

orange – апельсин

red – қызыл

sweet – тәтті

dog – ит

play – ойнау

cook – тамақ дайындау

dinner – кешкі ас

evening – кеш
fields.grammar:
Көпше түрлер: apples, oranges

Артикльдер: a dog (жалпы), the apples (белгілі)

Артикльсіз жалпы ұғымдар: Dogs love to play.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What did you buy yesterday?
Student: I bought apples and oranges.
Teacher: Do dogs love to play?
Student: Yes, dogs love to play.
Teacher: Who cooks dinner at home?
Student: My mother cooks dinner every evening.

fields.title: Салыстырмалы шырай (Comparative adjectives: bigger, smaller)
fields.content: My brother is taller than me. My house is bigger than my friend's house. Cats are smaller than dogs. Almaty is bigger than Shymkent.
fields.vocabulary:
tall – ұзын бойлы

big – үлкен

small – кішкентай

house – үй

cat – мысық

dog – ит

than – қарағанда

city – қала

brother – аға, іні

friend – дос
fields.grammar:
Салыстырмалы шырай сын есімдерге "-er" жалғауы қосылып жасалады.

Мысалдар:

big → bigger

tall → taller

small → smaller
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Who is taller, you or your brother?
Student: My brother is taller than me.
Teacher: Which is bigger, Almaty or Shymkent?
Student: Almaty is bigger than Shymkent.

fields.title: Күшейтпелі шырай (Superlative adjectives: biggest, smallest)
fields.content: My father is the tallest in my family. This is the biggest house in our street. The smallest animal in the zoo is a mouse. Today is the hottest day of the year.
fields.vocabulary:
tall – ұзын бойлы (tallest)

big – үлкен (biggest)

small – кішкентай (smallest)

family – отбасы

street – көше

animal – жануар

zoo – зоопарк

mouse – тышқан

hot – ыстық (hottest)

year – жыл
fields.grammar:
Күшейтпелі шырай сын есімдерге "-est" жалғауы қосылып жасалады.

Мысалдар:

big → the biggest

small → the smallest

hot → the hottest
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Who is the tallest in your family?
Student: My father is the tallest in my family.
Teacher: What's the smallest animal in the zoo?
Student: The smallest animal in the zoo is a mouse.

fields.title: Модаль етістіктер: must және should
fields.content: I must do my homework every day. You should eat healthy food. We must be polite to our teachers. You should sleep early.
fields.vocabulary:
must – міндетті түрде керек

should – кеңес ретінде керек

homework – үй тапсырмасы

healthy – пайдалы, денсаулыққа жақсы

food – тағам

polite – сыпайы

teacher – мұғалім

sleep – ұйықтау

early – ерте

every day – күн сайын
fields.grammar:
Must – қатаң міндеттілік.

Should – жұмсақ міндеттілік, кеңес.

Мысалдар:

I must do homework.

You should eat healthy food.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What must you do every day?
Student: I must do my homework every day.
Teacher: What should we eat?
Student: We should eat healthy food.

fields.title: Basic conjunctions (and, but, because)
fields.content: I like tea and coffee. My brother likes apples, but he doesn't like bananas. I study English because it's interesting.
fields.vocabulary:
tea – шай

coffee – кофе

apple – алма

banana – банан

study – оқу

English – ағылшын тілі

interesting – қызықты

like – ұнату

and – және

because – өйткені
fields.grammar:
And – және

But – бірақ

Because – себебі, өйткені

Мысалдар:

I like tea and coffee.

He likes apples, but doesn't like bananas.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Do you like tea and coffee?
Student: Yes, I like tea and coffee.
Teacher: Why do you study English?
Student: Because it's interesting.

fields.title: Health and Body
fields.content: I have two eyes, two ears, one nose, and one mouth. My hands and legs are strong. To stay healthy, we should wash our hands, brush our teeth, and eat good food.
fields.vocabulary:
eye – көз

ear – құлақ

nose – мұрын

mouth – ауыз

hand – қол

leg – аяқ

healthy – дені сау

wash – жуу

brush teeth – тісті тазалау

good food – пайдалы тамақ
fields.grammar:
Дене мүшелері туралы айтқанда "have/has" қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

I have two eyes.

He has strong hands.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: How many eyes do you have?
Student: I have two eyes.
Teacher: How can we stay healthy?
Student: We should wash our hands and eat good food.

fields.title: City vs. Countryside
fields.content: I live in the city. The city is big and noisy. There are many cars, shops, and schools. My cousin lives in the countryside. The countryside is quiet and beautiful. There are trees, animals, and farms. Life in the city is busier than life in the countryside.
fields.vocabulary:
city – қала

countryside – ауыл, қала сыртындағы жер

noisy – шулы

quiet – тыныш

beautiful – әдемі

tree – ағаш

animal – жануар

farm – ферма

busy – қарбалас, бос емес

life – өмір
fields.grammar:
Екі нәрсені салыстыруда comparative adjectives қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

The city is bigger and busier than the countryside.

The countryside is quieter than the city.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: Where do you live?
Student: I live in the city. It's big and noisy.
Teacher: Where does your cousin live?
Student: He lives in the countryside. It's quiet and beautiful.

fields.title: Nature and Weather
fields.content: I love nature. In summer, the weather is hot and sunny. In winter, it is cold and snowy. Today, the sky is cloudy, and it might rain soon.
fields.vocabulary:
nature – табиғат

weather – ауа райы

summer – жаз

winter – қыс

hot – ыстық

sunny – күн шуақты

cold – суық

snowy – қарлы

cloudy – бұлтты

rain – жаңбыр
fields.grammar:
Ауа-райын сипаттау үшін "it is" қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

It is hot and sunny.

It is cold and snowy.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's the weather like in summer?
Student: It's hot and sunny in summer.
Teacher: What's the weather like today?
Student: It's cloudy, and it might rain.

fields.title: Jobs and Professions
fields.content: My mother is a teacher. She teaches students. My father is a doctor. He helps sick people. My uncle is a farmer. He grows fruits and vegetables.
fields.vocabulary:
job – мамандық, жұмыс

profession – кәсіп

teacher – мұғалім

doctor – дәрігер

farmer – фермер

student – оқушы

help – көмектесу

sick – науқас

grow – өсіру

vegetables – көкөністер
fields.grammar:
Кімнің қандай мамандықта екенін сипаттау үшін Present Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

My mother is a teacher.

She teaches students.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What is your mother's job?
Student: She is a teacher.
Teacher: What does your uncle do?
Student: He is a farmer. He grows vegetables.

fields.title: My hobbies and interests
fields.content: My hobby is playing football. My sister likes reading books. My brother loves painting. My friends and I often go cycling on weekends.
fields.vocabulary:
hobby – хобби

interest – қызығушылық

football – футбол

read – оқу

book – кітап

paint – сурет салу

cycling – велосипед тебу

weekend – демалыс күндері

like – ұнату

often – жиі
fields.grammar:
Хобби мен қызығушылықтарды сипаттағанда Present Simple қолданылады.

Мысалдар:

My hobby is playing football.

My sister likes reading books.
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What's your hobby, Dias?
Dias: My hobby is playing football.
Teacher: What does your sister like to do?
Dias: She likes reading books.

fields.title: Қайталау сабағы
fields.content: I live in a big city. Every morning, I wake up at 7 o'clock. Yesterday, I went to the park. Tomorrow, I'm going to visit my grandmother. My brother is taller than me. We should eat healthy food.
fields.vocabulary:
city – қала

morning – таңертең

wake up – ояну

yesterday – кеше

tomorrow – ертең

visit – бару, кездесу

park – саябақ

tall – ұзын бойлы

healthy – пайдалы, денсаулыққа жақсы

food – тағам
fields.grammar:
Present Simple (I wake up)

Past Simple (I went)

Future going to (I'm going to visit)

Comparative adjectives (taller)

Should (кеңес беру үшін)
fields.dialogue:
Teacher: What time do you wake up every day?
Student: I wake up at 7 o'clock.
Teacher: What did you do yesterday?
Student: I went to the park.
Teacher: What are you going to do tomorrow?
Student: I'm going to visit my grandmother.

fields.title: Present Perfect шаққа кіріспе
fields.content:
My Life Experiences

My name is Alibek, and I have visited many interesting places. I have traveled to Almaty, Astana, and Shymkent. I have tried different foods, and I have met many new people. My sister has studied English for three years, and she has improved a lot. My father has worked in Astana since 2018. He has lived there for five years. My mother has cooked dinner, and we are going to eat now. Have you finished your homework yet?
fields.vocabulary:
experience – тәжірибе

visit – бару, келу (visited)

travel – саяхаттау (traveled)

try – байқап көру, дәмін көру (tried)

food – тағам

meet – кездесу, танысу (met)

people – адамдар

study – оқу (studied)

improve – жақсару, жетілдіру (improved)

work – жұмыс істеу (worked)

live – тұру (lived)

cook – тамақ дайындау (cooked)

dinner – кешкі ас

finish – аяқтау (finished)

yet – әлі
fields.grammar:
Present Perfect шақ өткенде басталған, бірақ қазіргі уақытпен байланысы бар немесе жалғасып жатқан іс-әрекеттерді сипаттау үшін қолданылады.

Құрылымы:

I / you / we / they → have + (V3/ed)

he / she / it → has + (V3/ed)

Мысалдар:
